document.docAuthor: Zeng, Yongsan, Ye, Weimin, Tredway, Lane, Martin, Samuel & Martin, Matt
document.masterDocTitle: Taxonomy and morphology of plant-parasitic nematodes associated with turfgrasses in North and South Carolina, USA

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Taxonomy and morphology of plant-parasitic nematodes associated with turfgrasses in North and South Carolina, USA

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 3. Micrographs of J2 of
Meloidogyne graminis
,
M. naasi
,
Heterodera
sp. and
Cactodera
sp. from turfgrasses in NC and SC. Scale bars: A, E, I, L=50µm; B–D, F–H, J, K, M–O=20µm. A. Entire body of
M. graminis
. B. Pharyngeal region of
M. graminis
. C,D. Tail of
M. graminis
. E. Entire body of
M. naasi
. F. Pharyngeal region of
M. naasi
. G,H. Tails of
M. naasi
. I. Entire body of H . sp. J. Pharyngeal region of H. sp. K. Tail of H. sp. L. Entire body of C . sp. M. Pharyngeal region of C . sp. N,O. Tails of C . sp.

TABLE 4.
Pratylenchus penetrans
: morphometrics of males and females mounted in formalin-glycerin. All measurements

subSubSection.paragraph: in μm and in the format: mean ± S.D. (range).
